answerText: Shanghai[10] The main city in the region of the Pearl River delta is this city, China's third largest and the largest in southern China. It was formerly known as Canton.

subject: Geography
question: Question: For 10 points each, name these Chinese cities. [10] The Yu Garden is found in this city, the largest in the world, which is found at the mouth of the Yangtze River.
